original_text:
And he will swallow up on this mountain
    the covering that is cast over all peoples,
    the veil that is spread over all nations.
korean_text: 또 이 산에서 모든 민족의 얼굴을 가린 가리개와 열방 위에 덮인 덮개를 제하시며

sentences.original_text: And he will swallow up on this mountain
the covering that is cast over all peoples
the veil that is spread over all nations.
